question: 集まる
sourceMnemonic: I bet you remember <ja>集める</ja> which means "to collect." This is similar to that, except you're not doing the action of collecting, it's just happening. Instead of "to collect" it's <vocabulary>to come together</vocabulary>. You can remember this because a herd of <reading>Maru</reading>s (the cat) will come together into one place if they sense a box there.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>集める</ja> so if you know that word you'll know how to read this word as well.
